description.value: This profile sets minimum expectations for a resource to record Dosage information for medication related resources. It is based on the [AU Base Dosage](http://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base/StructureDefinition-au-dosage.html) datatype profile and identifies the *additional* mandatory core elements, extensions, vocabularies and value sets that **SHALL** be present in the Dosage datatype when conforming to this profile. It provides the floor for standards development for specific uses cases in an Australian context.
